title: Cebu GNU Linux Users’ Group (CeGNULUG)
description: Cebu GNU Linux Users’ Group (CeGNULUG) was established by John Clark “Little John” Nadoza, being one of the first tech communities in Cebu. They started out as Mailing Lists.

title: PizzaPy Cebu Python Users Group
description: PizzaPy Cebu Python Users Group was founded by Daryl Yu and Marconi Moreto. First meetup was held at Handuraw Pizza – Gorordo Ave. Branch. It started as a monthly meetup to discuss about emerging technologies, other than Python.

title: PizzaPy and PyCon Philippines 2016
description: PizzaPy helped out Python Philippines to organize PyCon Philippines 2016 in Cebu, at the University of the Philippines Cebu Performing Arts Hall.

title: 2nd Generation Lead Organizers
description: Neriah “BJ” Alto, Cleo Credo, Jammar Londino, and Cristopher Cutas took over as the 2nd Generation Lead Organizers of PizzaPy.

title: PizzaPy Reborn
description: PizzaPy is revived again with Ron Michael Kho’s initiative. Meetups were supported by the newly opened Co-Working Space, The Company at JDN Square. They eventually opened a branch in IT Park.

title: UP Cebu STITCH & Arduino Day Cebu
description: PizzaPy Cebu, UP Cebu STITCH, and the Cebu Innovation Network launched Arduino Day Cebu 2019, the first National Arduino Programming Competition. This was held at Fablab UP Cebu.

title: PizzaPy Online Meetups
description: Cebu was quarantined due to the COVID-19 pandemic. All PizzaPy Meetups were held online from this point. We used Zoom and Google Meet for the first few meetups, but discovered GatherTown afterwards on February, 2021.

title: First AI Ethics Conversation
description: Together with the government, and local companies, we organized the first AI Ethics conversation in Cebu. This meetup inspired the creation of The Ambit, an org that promotes and empowers participation in Ethical AI Governance.

title: PizzaPy Book Club Series
description: PizzaPy brings in Jacob Michael Silva as the Co-Lead Organizer. He also spearheads the PizzaPy Book Club Series, where we read a technical book every month, depending on the theme for the quarter.

title: Cebu Hacktoberfest
description: During the 7th anniversary of PizzaPy, we participated in the first Cebu Hacktoberfest. The event was spearheaded by Dorell James Galang, and had the help of all the existing Cebu Tech Communities that time.

title: PizzaPy Website Launch
description: This website was launched. Along with PizzaPy being officially recognized as a local user group and being awarded the Python Software Foundation Grant.
